title: [TEST] Implement API contract testing
body:
## Problem
No contract testing between frontend and backend APIs.

## Tasks
- [ ] Choose contract testing tool (Pact/Postman)
- [ ] Define API contracts
- [ ] Implement contract tests
- [ ] Add to CI pipeline
- [ ] Document process

## Acceptance Criteria
- All endpoints have contracts
- Contract tests in CI
- Breaking changes detected
- Documentation complete

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 8 story points
